# Darkvision, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], Prime Underdark guide 4, [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a dried carrot or three small agates)

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Targets:** Allies in a 10-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 59

*As you conclude the spell’s casting, you are aware of being able to see without light. A glance at your allies show that they too perceive more than before.*

This spell functions like *[[Darkvision (Spell)|darkvision]]*, except that all target creatures receive the spell’s benefits. Unlike with *[[Darkvision (Spell)|darkvision]],* recipients of this spell cannot have the ability made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Prime Underdark guide 4, Ranger 4 to Level per Underdark.

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 4 to Level.
